chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
Yes
cool! i'm at the starting point now
to my left, there's a twig heading to a small island with a tiger. where to go next bud?
Go over the twig on top of the water to the next island.
alright, crossed the twig, now on the island with the tiger
what's the next move, mate?
Go under the tiger to avoid them and go to the next twig.
got it, snuck under the tiger, and now i'm on the twig
am i going towards the butterfly or the parrot?
The parrot. Go above the parrot.
okay, went above the parrot
am i heading towards the elephant or the frog now?
The elephant first, go around the bird and past the elephant toward the rocks.
understood, managed to squeeze past the elephant, now i see rocks ahead
Yes, go over the rocks toward the frog.
sure thing, hopped over the rocks, frog in sight, where to next?
Kind of loop under the frog then you're going to have to go over the crocodile.
looped under the frog, now i'm over the crocodile, where to now?
Go to that black rock, hop on it, then hop onto the land.
alright, hopped from the croc to the rock and from the rock to land, i can see the elephant again, guess we've come full circle, eh? what now?
You see the other set of rocks by the giraffe?? Go over those rocks then leap in front of the giraffe.
gotcha, crossed the rocks, and now i'm in front of the giraffe, nice view from here! what's next?
There's another twig on top of the wat, you're gonna have to cross over the twig, past the snake.
crossed the twig, steered clear of the snake, i think i see the treasure, buddy! the moment of truth, am i going the right way?
Yes!! Now grab the treasure and you're done!
you've got it, chief, grabbed the treasure, what a journey! *finished*

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
Si
perfecto! empecemos, va a ser divertido
desplázate unos cuantos pasos hacia la izquierda, justo debajo de ese banco de madera. ¿lo ves?
si
¡genial! ahora cruza el camino hacia el puesto de flores, pero ten cuidado y no llegues al puesto
en vez de eso, haz un giro de 180 grados a la izquierda y regresa a donde estaba el perro blanco
Okay
estupendo, ahora ve hacia el sur, cruzando por encima del banco, y sigue hacia abajo
deberías ver a otro perro blanco cerca de un mantel de picnic a cuadros. ¿lo ves?
si, lo veo
perfecto! ahora, sigue el camino pasando por encima del mantel, da un toquecito a esa taza de frutas, y continua hacia el oeste
ok
ahora, deberías ver una rama de madera haciendo de puente sobre el río, ve a cruzarla nuevamente pero esta vez hacia el norte
ok
bien hecho! ahora, en vez de pasar por la mata verde, rodeala por la derecha hasta que llegues al puesto de flores
Estoy perdido
tranquilo, estoy aquí
estás cerca del puesto de flores, ¿verdad? simplemente sigue a la derecha del arbusto verde y no lo toques. llegarás al puesto de flores
si, creo que si
¡genial! ahora gira a la izquierda, pasa por debajo del puesto de flores, y fíjate en ese gran puente donde hay dos personas en bicicleta
si
ahora sigue camino al oeste, pasando el puente, y a pocos pasos a la vista verás a dos ancianos sentados en un banco leyendo un periódico, ¿los ves?
si
perfecto, ahora simplemente muévete un poco al sur, entre los viejitos y la rama de madera, deberías llegar a un bosque verde junto al extremo de esa rama de madera
ok
ahora anda hacia el este, entre la rama y el arbusto
¿me sigues?
si
fantástico! unos pasos al este deberías ver un jóven ciervo marrón
¡eso es todo, lo has logrado! ¿lo ves?
si
¡bravo! ahí va el gran final, bien hecho, amigo
fue divertido ¿verdad?

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
si
awesome! currently, i'm north at the tent
where do i head from here?
Head down a few steps, go past the dog
alrighty! just strolled past the cute dog, do i go towards the fire or the mushroom pals?
Toward the fire, but go above the fire
sure thing! now i'm above the fire
right to the mushroom or down towards the car?
Toward the mushrom, then under the mushroom
okie dokie, just below the mushroom now
looks like the blue car and telescope are coming up. should i keep heading south?
Curl with the road around that bush, then go toward teh telescope
got it! curving around that bush, now near the telescope
should i continue south or head towards the rocks?
continue south, don't go between the bushes in the road, but go around the telescope and the bush, to the dirt road.
gotcha! took the dirt road around the telescope, bypassed the bushes
i'm seeing the wooden house surrounded by rocks. is this our final stop?
Yes, go over the rocks to the house and you're there!
sweet! just clambered over the rocks
hey, i made it to the house! *finished* thanks for guiding, cheers buddy!

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
Si!!
awesome! now, can you see the three palm trees? go under the first one heading south-west. then, turn right and cross the second tree
sharp left turn before the third palm and head south. keep going like that!
Got it
fantastic! now, do you see a cute brown puppy? go to his left, then slight left and turn right heading south
got it.
great! next, you'll see a big rock on your left and a small rock on your right
pass between them and carry on till you hit the water. exciting, huh?
Ok toward the crab?
exactly! now turn right, and follow the shoreline, sidling along that big rock
keep heading west
Ok, toward the shark?
yep, but don't get too close! take a sharp right when you see it, ok?
ok
awesome! now, go back to dry land. you'll find a medium rock and a colorful ball
pass between them and head north. keep it up, buddy!
Toward the speaker?
yep, you got it! but veer a wee bit to your left, heading north-west
you'll want to pass between that red tent on your left and the speaker on the right
ok what's next?
nice one! now circle around the tent, just like that
head south, but don't get your feet wet! turn right just before the shore
So I go past the kayak?
exactly! just duck below it and keep going along the same path
excellent job!
Then what?
take a hard right turn (north) and keep moving until you bump into a small green bush
and voila! mission accomplished.

Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I don't think much of it. If it's naturl for them, it's fine.
